website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, feature-rich vacuum by a trusted brand. If your budget is your top concern, this is the one to buy.
pros: Very low price point yet doesn't skimp on features
Includes a useful crevice tool, long hose, and easy-to-adjust brush bar for cleaning different types of flooring
Canister accommodates as much as 3 litres of dirt
cons: Some plastic parts don't feel very durable
Doesn't pick up pet hair very well
May lose some suction power over time

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this hoover. Plasticky, lightweight, constantly needs filters unblocking, no edge to edge cleaning, cant seem to cope with even the average household floor dirt such as pet hair. Very very disappointing. Sending mine back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed
customer_reviews.text: Brand new carpet. We have a cat. We didn't think it was bad. As you can see, bloody brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: DAVID M.

customer_reviews.title: Users beware
customer_reviews.text: It sucks like a vacuum should but every time I go to empty it I get a massive static jolt . Hoover didn't want to know about it being a fault for safety reasons. Amazon was very fast with a replacement and the new one gave a kick also... This is just too dangerous to have in the house with a child that has a heart condition.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Meyer

customer_reviews.title: This Hoover Sucks!..... As it should !!
customer_reviews.text: This hoover is powerful. Lots of suction and very versatile. The bin is so big that you really don't realise how much dirt you've sucked out of the carpet until you've finished. The hose is extremely long, although I'll hardly use it as I have a small cordless, too. The cable is very long, so I hardly have to stop at all to change sockets.
customer_reviews.author: CarolAnne & Dave

customer_reviews.title: worst ever vac
customer_reviews.text: Having had Hoover vacuums for the last 45 years, this is the worst one I have ever had, the sooner it wears out the better. !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack H.

customer_reviews.title: I love this hoover - it is brilliant for pet hairs ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this hoover - it is brilliant for pet hairs which is ideal in my house with 4 dogs in residence. It is also incredibly quiet - such a difference to my old hoover which nearly deafened us!
customer_reviews.author: ValS

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY ! Hoover Breeze Evo Pets Bagless Upright Vacuum Cleaner,
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy a Hoover Breeze Evo Pets B, Lightweight, Initially it seemed to work well but I found it was difficult to put the bin bag on after emptying and it's hard to remove and replace the hose for doing stairs and awkward corners. The suction after washing and drying the filters twice has become very poor and to be honest I do not like this cleaner enough to buy new replacements. I have checked the hoses etc for blockages but have decided this vacuum which has such poor suction is heading for a skip.
customer_reviews.author: tam hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Quiet hoover
customer_reviews.text: This is a very quiet hoover with different settings for suction control. The on and off button is at the bottom which you have to do with your feet and it's a bit uncomfortable. Sucks up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: what a find
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have always chosen a Dyson, we have quite a few over the years. We came across this Hoover Breeze pets bag less up right, what a find, light easy to handle, not much noise when it is running. We will buy this one again, Plus I think the HOOVER IS ABOUT £150 CHEAPER than the D---- We are so pleased with our new cleaner
customer_reviews.author: JSBASFORD

customer_reviews.title: What a horrible mistake!! No suction AT ALL!! Never buying again
customer_reviews.text: Absolute waste of money. Little to nothing suction and when I say no suction I literally mean 0% suction power. The hover couldn't even pick up "BREAD CRUMBS" from the table top. It is as heavy as a baby elephant and the stair tool make a shite load of noise and does not even sucks up Guinea pig bedding little tiny wood-shavings. If you like your back broken while hover-ring and hover not even picking a small grain of sand please go ahead and buy this crap. I always loved upright hoovers but this made me hate them to a next level. I am NEVER buying any of this brand product ever again. What a waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Taimoor Kheshgi

customer_reviews.title: Not a Pet Vaccuum
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to say really. I am useless at returning items. It does not pick up any dog hair unless I use the attachment. Fiddly to change attachments. The connecting hose has unglued. I have gaffer tape holding it together. It is not a Pet Vaccuum. It just has an attachment. I have to keep unlocking that too. It is a fierce attachment. Would not want to get anything caught in the rotating brush.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hoovering
customer_reviews.text: Not the lightest of cleaners but certainly the quietest I have had, and brilliant suction too. Easy to empty the bin and clean the filters. Overall I am very happy with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Downer

customer_reviews.title: Quality little sucker
customer_reviews.text: A lot lighter than Dyson hoovers. Does just as good a job picking up dust and dirt. When using the hose to hoover stairs, prepare to catch it as it will topple over. I personally am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all with this purchase. I've had it 2 months and the filters broken. It keeps flapping about every time I hoover. Very annoying. I have had this hoover before and it was great. Doesn't see the same as my last one at all, starting to loose the suction too.
customer_reviews.author: mrsembo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I think this vacuum cleaner is excellent value for the money great suction picks up extremely well very easy to use cannot fault this at all unlike some who have left negative comments , yes I have been a previous owner of a more very expensive Vacuum cleaner which I disliked very much but if you are someone looking for an inexpensive vacuum cleaner that does the job I highly recommend this Hoover Breeze.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne martin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had to be assembled on delivery. This was a bit tricky. This is an upright Hoover with a lead. It is light and picks up animal hair well. It feels quite flimsy. The extending tube seems to be an after thought as it doesn't sit well on the Hoover. The fastenings are flimsy, especially aware of this when emptying the dirt out. This is bagless. It wasn't expensive so I guess you get what you pay for. Would I recommend this? For the money, yes I would. It is not heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: KimKim

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning, tips over if hoovering stairs
customer_reviews.text: Great hoover for pet hair, even without using the specified pet hair attachment! Really made a difference in the look of my carpets after my last hoover! Although the extension pipe reaches the top of the stairs, I find you can’t use it without the hoover tipping over- even at a distance of 2-3 stairs. Some wear already showing on pipes and we’ve only had it around 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and nasty
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 weeks, must have used less than 10 times. It looks like the beater bar has stopped working although the pipe suction is still there. Now I've got to return but already disposed of box, so a bit annoying. A lesson not to buy anything bulky from Amazon again. The hoover reminded me of a child's toy from the 80s, the build quality was that poor. On the plus side, while it worked, it was a lot quieter than most hoovers. But useless if it's designed to last the lifetime of a Mayfly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave James

customer_reviews.title: Does everything we ask of it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use once you figured out what the tools are for and how they fit. We use it exclusively upstairs so it tends to be used on fluffier carpet to pick up light dirt and for this it works a treat.
customer_reviews.author: David Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Superb as a second vacuum cleaner. Don't have to carry it up and down stairs with the extra long hose. Suction is okay but not quite enough for a deep carpet clean but ideal for soft furnishings. For the price a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Barrowboy53

customer_reviews.title: Hoover
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight hoover which is easy to use but it’s not very good at picking up hair, litter granules, anything really. I don’t live in a huge place but the electric lead is very short, I have to plug it in to every room I do. Don’t recommend this at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Broke in just 5 months of use. At first the suction was brilliant and we had no issues then slowly over time the function started getting worse and worse to the point it now doesn’t even suck. Sounds like it has air escaping from the front which I’m baffled by as we’ve taken really good care of this hoover as in quite anal about hoovering. We’ve taken it apart and tried to fix it however it’s still not working. We’ve ended up buying a shark instead as even tho it’s £100 more it is much much better quality. Please don’t make the mistake I did of falling for the price tag of this item as it’s very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carolay

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY this
customer_reviews.text: WORST hoover we have ever had DON'T buy this has NO SUCTION what so ever stuck with this piece of crap cause the return windows closed
customer_reviews.author: c d

customer_reviews.title: A perfectly nice machine
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is light has a good suction power. The one thing l don't like is the hose hanging round the vacuum it keeps dropping off. Other than that it's a good machine especially the length of the hose for the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Allen

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the negative reviews!
customer_reviews.text: This hoover is the best hoover I’ve ever owned!! It’s brilliant. In the attached photo was it’s first outing at my house! One minor negative would be there’s no real instructions on how to use it and the power pedal is awkward. But really good hoover
customer_reviews.author: Craig Hubble

customer_reviews.title: AVOID - badly constructed and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Have missed the window to return this hoover for refund as not used straight away. Trying to clean house today, after cleaning filter couldn't get the dust canister to click back on and it kept falling off then noticed the lack of suction is because the canister and suction holes are misaligned so are not sealed. No wonder I am going over the same piece of carpet trying to get dirt picked up!! Had a Morphy Richards last in same sort of price bracket which was far superior to this one but unfortunately they don't make it any more...that was the best vacuum we have owned. Save your money and avoid would have given no stars if had been allowed
customer_reviews.author: Ces

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. The absolute very best upright corded vacuum cleaner you will ever own. We have had this particular make & model previously & only replaced our old one coz it was about 6 yrs old & the motor burnt out. Only thing I've paid out for is belts but that's fine. Definitely worth every penny & an excellent investment for anyone with dog's like we have & cats aswell
customer_reviews.author: Dave Warren

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money, powerful but not heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great hoover especially if you have a pet, easy to empty & clean, great for the stairs as it's not to heavy & with the long reach I can have it plugged in downstairs & it reaches all the way upstairs & we dont have a standard staircase as it's an old house!! Great suction & being able to vary it for different floors is great
customer_reviews.author: Jules Richardson

customer_reviews.title: machine recycled at local top - now got a Shark and I’m pleased with it.
customer_reviews.text: Plasticky product and feels cheap. Suction not brilliant and suction tube split easily - repaired with frog tape. Not great for getting into corners on stairs - sorry. Please don’t buy this, the belt has snapped and the cleaner is falling apart. Now held together by frog tape. Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gill

customer_reviews.title: Drive belt broke halfway through first use. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small flat so we aren’t exactly talking about heavy usage. But the drive belt snapped halfway through the first use. I will be asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: No help from seller
customer_reviews.text: I'm so angry and frustrated with this item and the lack of response from the seller. I purchased this hoover in January. Last weekend it sucked up its own seal on the head and started smoking. I rang hoover, who told me it was an issue for amazon to solve, but i emailed the seller and have had no response whatsoever. I am disabled and cannot repair this myself, but have no one who can repair it for me either.
customer_reviews.author: Aliyah M

customer_reviews.title: Would think twice about buying this if you have stairs and hard floor.
customer_reviews.text: I feel I give fair feedback but this hoover is rubbish, it is cheap plastic, the pet stair attachment clips onto the handle very lose and keeps coming off, the suction from the hose is very week, doesn't pick up the pet hair from the stairs which you think it would being a pet hoover, doesn't puck up slightly larger bits off hard floor as not powerful enough. The carpet suction is quite good but that is all the good I can say about it. Very disappointed and will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner is lightweight, and quieter than most with good suction. Just what I needed for my winter floor rugs for which my cordless didn't have the power. I don't have pets so can't comment regarding fur and hair. I don't have stairs so I rated it according to the use of the extension tube and tools. The extension tube has a good long reach. For the price it is a very good vacuum cleaner. 4 Stars because it is not as powerful as other corded vacuum cleaners out there but still good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: FTW

customer_reviews.title: Beware, not fit for purpose!!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered today, used for five minutes, and it started to smell of burning, then started to smoke. Had to disconnect it and take it outside. Now on its way back to Amazon for a refund. Looking at other reviews, it's a bit of a bit and miss product, it appeared to be working fine initially, and had good suction, but was clearly defective when dispatched. I would suggest there is a lack of quality control at the manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Good with dog hair
customer_reviews.text: Works well at clearing the dog hair left by our extremely hairy Labrador. Cylinder needs emptying after each room
customer_reviews.author: Kate R

customer_reviews.title: Hoover Breeze Evo vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Works well.Arrived I it’s original box which had become a bit battered in transit. Hoover itself was undamaged and is working well. Easy to empty
customer_reviews.author: bridee

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money!
customer_reviews.text: For the price I love this vacuum! It’s my second one.. my first recently dies on me after 3 years! I love hoovering! Do it at least once a day..And have tried Dyson & Shark in the past, they are good too, but I can’t see what they are 4 time’s the price!!! Especially as they’ve gone all hand held.. I like an upright! This sucks up my cats hair and kids mess perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Miss E Brookes

customer_reviews.title: Quids In
customer_reviews.text: Good quality economical choice for a hoover for sure. Only thing to consider for those who it applies to/ will be bothered by it, is that the hoover to me feels heavier than more expensive brands. It's a compromise that's worth it if you want a hoover that works really well without spending more money! It's certainly not a cheap hoover that doesn't work properly.
customer_reviews.author: All At Once

customer_reviews.title: Great hoover if you need a height adjustable brush bar
customer_reviews.text: Perfect hoover for what we wanted. We needed a variable height brush bar for different carpets in our home and this means the hoover has great suction on all of them including easily dealing with the hair of two cats a dog! Yes it’s a bit plasticy feeling but it’s a cheap hoover and it doesn’t affect its ability to do a good job. The attachments are easy to use and everything is stored neatly on the hoover. It’s a breeze to empty and really easy to manoeuvre on wood flooring and at the right height, on carpet too. Would thoroughly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MRS C

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one full week before breaking down completely. Still trying to get help to repair or replace from Hoover/candy. Feels cheap, very noisy and like I say it didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: David Asm

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Really poor quality used once really good after that it didn't pick up small bits off carpets .it was only £70.00 but wouldn't buy again I have now brought Dyson
customer_reviews.author: Karen Dowler

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: As an owner of a German shepherd I cannot believe how well this hoover picks up his hair. I have tried various hoovers over the years but this is by far the best and lightest to handle. 10 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: kd

customer_reviews.title: light and easy to use good suction
customer_reviews.text: loved using this amazed at how much it picked up was easy to use. fast delivery and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Gillian knox

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous hoover
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic hoover and great price too! Mine arrived on time and it was simple to get started, it's suction is really nice and strong. I would recommend this product. ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, don’t bother with this hover it’s com please rubbish and doesn’t suck anything up. All it does is move the dirt around for you to have to use a dust pan and brush sited. I don’t have the packaging or I would send it back. I now have to go and buy another vacuum, what a waste of money. 🤬
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S Ingham-Hope

customer_reviews.title: This product is great it does what says.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bourght one some time ago Good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It would be great if everything was there
customer_reviews.text: The screw was missing so I could not put together
customer_reviews.author: Janice White

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a very heavy pull-along cleaner and it is a great Improvement. Light-weight, good suction. Very pleased with it, the only disadvantage - it will not fit into my cuoboard.
customer_reviews.author: Floral

customer_reviews.title: hoover
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but not as much suction as the vax pets. Easier to use than the Dyson as more light weight
customer_reviews.author: Amzon Allan

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Suction power isn’t brilliant, have to go over an area several times for it to pick all the animal hairs up. Screw that holds the handle on keeps coming loose too
customer_reviews.author: Kirsty

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job on my Husky’s fur. Also quicker delivery than originally advised. Light weight and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awkward hoses ?,
customer_reviews.text: the vac is ok , but haveing to change hoses for nossel is a bit of a pain , very good suction but very noisey , not one of the better vacs , but also not the worst , will do the job , but wouldn`t buy again .
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Usefull backup hoover
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best Vacuum cleaner our there, suction is not great, however as a second vacuum cleaner it does a job and its relatively cheap, its also very light to carry and use
customer_reviews.author: TheReviewGuy

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight with lots of suction and a great reach when needed
customer_reviews.text: A very lightweight machine with great suction, easy to clean, initially hard to click the top and body back into place; but has eased with use
customer_reviews.author: Pat Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Low suction
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for light house work not dogs or children very low suction but good price I wish vacuum companies would put the suction power on their advertising Too scared I guess
customer_reviews.author: mrs d e collins

customer_reviews.title: Really good purchase, just what I need
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dislike about this hoover, its great, its not too heavy and is really good when you have pets! I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: JMc57

customer_reviews.title: No power of suction
customer_reviews.text: It absolutely shocking , it’s heavy , won’t pick up and blows the dust around the kitchen floor , no power at all , it terrible. I could not give it any stars at all
customer_reviews.author: Sadie bibby

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this vacuum , its so light weight and it's super for cleaning my stairs with the pipe stretching up so no struggling . Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This my second Hoover as my first one was so so good l then brought this second one to use for my business (pub) many thanks
customer_reviews.author: dawn swift

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Used it for one month and it has packed in.would not buy this hoover people
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Arbuckle

customer_reviews.title: Bagless and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, easy use, cleans up very well, being bagless emptying is so simple, understanding the instructions is not easy along with putting it together, although if you spend a little time it all works out quite easy.
customer_reviews.author: dm2

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok...
customer_reviews.text: A cheap hoover so don’t expect great things. It picks up dirt but I prefer more powerful hoovers. Both rubber seals came off within the first two days. It’s ok for a cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Had it over 6 months now and still picks up great. The only reason I have knocked one star off is because the adapter for the stairs is rubbish. Barely picks up so I just use the hose connection.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: There is a peaceful humming sound of my cleaning activities and excellent in cleaning up any dirt and debris. Even my neighbors like the sound compared to my previous one!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great hoover overall..
customer_reviews.text: Great hoover, good power..easy to maneuver. Only thing the is where the extension pipe is stored, keeps on coming off when you use the hoover. It's a bit annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Phill Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight great for plush thick pile carpets
customer_reviews.text: Great for plush carpets as struggled with a dyson would highly recommend. Great suction lightweight .
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Excellent came within the time well wraped up a very pleased customer
customer_reviews.text: At last I have found a cleaner that's great for my high pile carpet I have two dyson they are not so good, they are to heavy on high pile carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: This Hoover is the best ever hoover I have ever had. Suction is great. Long hose to do the stairs is brilliant. The pet part of the tools is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia peagram

customer_reviews.title: its a sucker for dust and dirt
customer_reviews.text: not that my carpets are dirty as they are not but I love the older type hovers there like me old
customer_reviews.author: dave wolstenholme

customer_reviews.title: Quiet lightweight cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Good lightweight vacuum cleaner with plenty of suction. Also not noisy. Stair extender useful but heavy to handle. Extender best left aside when not being used due to it's heaviness.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Hillocks Snr

customer_reviews.title: It appears to pick up.
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical as it doesn't sound very powerful but it does pick up the dirt, ok you need to go back and forward maybe twice to make sure but it does the job. It super light which I like as my last one was a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job you want it to do at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to empty and I like that you can change the height of the brush
customer_reviews.author: marion s

customer_reviews.title: Ok not great
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I expected the suction is ok but not great especially for pet hair
customer_reviews.author: rachell smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction.
customer_reviews.text: Tested it on short pile carpet and it didn't have enough suction to lift dog hair. Sent back immediately. Vax do a much better one (Mach air) for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: No regrets! Great hoover
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical about this Hoover because of the mixed reviews but decided to go for it and I’m so glad I did. Very good suction power, easy to move across carpet and floor and I love the ease of changing the tubes over to hoover the stairs. I have no regrets at all over this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Leyla Amatullah

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love my new hoover it's lightweight & easy to use & I clean all floors throughout my flat.
customer_reviews.author: Feebee

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered for a friend who has limited mobility but is able to use with ease
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: Nice hoover
customer_reviews.text: Nice hoover, only criticism is the cord isn't very long
customer_reviews.author: mrs v rachwal

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this useless piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: The worst hoover ever! I'm extremely disappointed: it couldn't even pick up dust bunnies on top of the carpet fibres, let alone anything in between fibres and our carpet isn't that plush. Returning this disastrous mistake right away. Would have given zero stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Miss T.V.

customer_reviews.title: Hoover very very poor suction.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor suction, I have purchased many Hoover vacuumes in the past and have always been very pleased with them. This is by far the worst Hoover I have EVER had and will no longer purchase in the future
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best hovers i have owned Great for long reach up stairs and ceiling for cobwebs. All thou very plastic it is very robust and light weight. I have no pets but the pet attachment is great for the stairs. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: fantastic item does what its ment to do
customer_reviews.text: fantastic item best hoover I've ever owned would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good vac for price
customer_reviews.text: Had several dysons and a shark in the past and apart from the hose for stairs being a bit short, can't complain about the performance of this vac.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M Swift

customer_reviews.title: Its quiet, works great defo recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and works great with pets hair it's got great suction its quiet the pet hair attachment is loud but is great to use very pleased with this item thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic vacuum. There's a piece of rubber attached underneath which is magic on pet hair but, otherwise, the machine is lightweight and easy to assemble/use.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A. C. Lake

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hoover
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice and nice to use it is very good
customer_reviews.author: shaun edward howard

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Wife needed a lighter model and is happy with this one
customer_reviews.author: pennylover

customer_reviews.title: Very poor suction for vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and I put together quite easily Long hose is unclear how to store Suction was very very poor so returned same day Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not built in Singapore tax haven...
customer_reviews.text: Good old British Hoover... And @£350 cheaper than a Dyson....
customer_reviews.author: Mr A MazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Not robust
customer_reviews.text: Hose has become detached from both ends and built is not very robust. Am trying to get a replacement as it is less than a year old. Older Hoovers certainly weren't like this one.
customer_reviews.author: SandyKite

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product
customer_reviews.text: Love it has lots of setting for hard floors to thick carpet easy to empty
customer_reviews.author: Levi Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This isanexcellent vacuum cleaner light weight easy to handle has everything you use with it

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Light and easy to use. Great on pet hair.

customer_reviews.title: THE WORST EVER!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE WORST HOOVER I HAVE EVER BOUGHT OR USED, ABSOLUTE WASTE OF MONEY.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a light vac for use due to arthritis making previous vac difficult to use. This proved to be perfect. Had borrowed same from a neighbour prior to ordering and have not been disappointed since it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Paul E. Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Carpets and stairs really long hose and has really gd suction love my new Hoover 😁
customer_reviews.author: Linda McCrory

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, lightweight, brilliant price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement, was so pleased I bought another for storing upstairs!
customer_reviews.author: uncle sam

customer_reviews.title: Not any where near powerful enough
customer_reviews.text: Extremely Weak suction, mainly just miles dirt atoynd and awkward with corners etc

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for anyone needing a lightweight but effective hoover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mum who needed a lightweight and simple to use hoover and pleased to say it ticked all the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.text: First time used fab after that hasn't picked up resorted to using handle hose as much better
